page.title: 16LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {Hoyland Police Station}was built in 1971.It has replaced the old one which was on George Street.This one is more central.It is on a main road and near to the motor way and industrial estates.It is a one storey building with a reception area to which the public have access. The other parts are private and consist of a) an office with a receptionist who deals with enquiries and enters all messages in a book. b) A secure area which contains 2 cells an interview room and the finger print room c)a locker room, d)a C.I.D. room. e) a canteen. f) A room where officers can do their paper work.
